A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Phenomenal. Riann Johnson take the usual Star Wars tropes and flips them on their head. I understand the divisive take on this film but really what Johnson is doing\, is putting out a statement. This is not what you're expecting in a Star Wars film. The series is no longer what you want it to be\, it is whatever the force wills it to be. As a long standing Star Wars fan\, I am thrilled with what this movie has done for the Star Wars Universe. An excellent movie through and through.
